title: Husky in a Hut
description: An adventurous series sure to win the hearts of animal lovers everywhere!While staying on Baffin Island, Mandy and her parents enjoy the thrill of a dogsled ride. But the trip is plunged into disaster when wolves attack one of the Husky teams.The lead dog, Nanook, is badly injured. Mandy helps move her to a secluded hut, but can she get the rescue party to Nanook in time?An alternate cover for this ISBN can be found here.
author: Ben M. Baglio
